CreateAlarm.Description: Create a single alarm, all properties are required

Params.RoomUUID: The UUID of the speaker you want this alarm for
Params.ProgramMetaData: The sound metadata, can be empty string
Params.IncludeLinkedZones: Should grouped palyers also play the alarm?

ListAlarms.Description: Get the AlarmList as XML, use ListAndParseAlarms for parsed version

UpdateAlarm.Description: Update an alarm, all parameters are required. Use PatchAlarm where you can update a single parameter

Params.ID: The ID of the alarm see ListAndParseAlarms
Params.RoomUUID: The UUID of the speaker you want this alarm for
Params.ProgramMetaData: The sound metadata, can be empty string
Params.IncludeLinkedZones: Should grouped palyers also play the alarm?

AVTransportService.Description: Service that controls stuff related to transport (play/pause/next/special urls)

BecomeCoordinatorOfStandaloneGroup.Description: Leave the current group and revert to a single player.

ConfigureSleepTimer.Description: Stop playing after set sleep timer

Params.NewSleepTimerDuration: Time to stop after, as hh:mm:ss

GetMediaInfo.Description: Get information about the current playing media (queue)

GetPositionInfo.Description: Get information about current position (position in queue and Time in current song)

Next.Description: Go to next song, not always supported

Previous.Description: Go to previous song, not always supported

Seek.Description: Seek track in queue, time delta or absolute time in song

Params.Target: number for track in queue, hh:mm:ss for absolute time in track

SetAVTransportURI.Description: Set the transport URI, to a song, a stream, the queue and a lot more

Params.Target: The metadata, see MetadataHelper.GuessTrack to guess based on track uri

SnoozeAlarm.Description: Snooze the current alarm for some time.

DevicePropertiesService.Description: Modify device properties, like led status and stereo pairs

ZoneGroupTopologyService.Description: Zone config stuff, eg getting all the configured sonos zones.
